overview: Yuya is sacked from his job and sets off on a journey with Kaito, an abandoned schoolboy. Through encounters with kind people and a reunion with his mother, Yuya begins to look at himself in a new light. A powerful portrayal of the warmth and bitterness of living with others.
tagline: Depicts the coexistence with others after overcoming an unfortunate upbringing.
title: Wrapped in a blanket of night
